overview:
Partner at Opera Capital Partners

Focus on providing M&A and fund raising advisory as well as strategic services to fast growing technology ventures, helping entrepreneurs and companies accelerate their growth.

Involved in current transactions in the field of mobile gaming, software and mobile applications. Most recent transaction: Videoplaza, $5m funding.

10 years experience in strategy consulting, business development and marketing in the ICT and Cleantech fields with a constant focus on growth related issues (organic and through M&A activities).

Regular speaker/reviewer at events:

  • Expert reviewer at the Microsoft Investor Summit 2009 in Prague.
  • Expert reviewer at the European Venture Summit 2008 and 2009, DÃƒÂ¼sseldorf, Germany.

Vice chairman of the French Chamber of Commerce in Sweden and Conseiller du Commerce Exterieur de la France (France Foreign Trade Advisor). Frederic is fluent in French, English and Swedish.
